alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 10:35PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact parts of southeast Minnesota and far northeast Iowa this evening... At 1032 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking numerous strong to severe storms near the Iowa Minnesota stateline. These storms continued to move east towards western Wisconsin. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will impact communities such as Preston, Decorah, Waukon, Spring Grove and Harmony. People attending the Fillmore County Fairgrounds, and the Allamakee County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa...southeastern Minnesota...and southwestern Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fillmore; Houston; Mower; Olmsted; Winona
